wikipedia_page.main: Lieutenant General Sir Richard George Collingwood KBE CB DSO (7 October 1903 – 21 April 1986) was a British Army General during the 1950s.

response: *1964–1969: Lt-Gen. Sir Richard George Collingwood, KBE, CB, DSO

link_mentions.page: List of governors of Edinburgh Castle

response: *Lt. General Sir George Collingwood, KBE, CB, DSO; & his brother Sir Edward Foyle Collingwood FRS, DL, CBE;
In 1958 he became Secretary to the General Officer Commanding-in-Chief of Scottish command and Governor of Edinburgh Castle; Lieutenant-General Sir George Collingwood.
*Major-General Richard George Collingwood, CBE DSO (27169), late Infantry.
